JER!A CITY UNDER THE STAIRS!UR'DU!630.X0.dialogue_text: This is the insanity ending. Here, the player discovers many of the events of Thetian's past, however, they are twisted and distorted. They combine with his experiences and the nightmares induced by the book. Here, Thetian becomes consumed by Mortis. He stays in the Wine Cellar, wandering until he starves to death.
